metadata.title: CVE-2018-20458 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In radare2 prior to 3.1.1, r_bin_dyldcache_extract inlibr/bin/format/mach0/dyldcache.c may allow attackers to cause adenial-of-service (application crash caused by out-of-bounds read) bycrafting an input file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20458` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-3.2 - 3.1.2+dfsg-1.1
libradare2-common - 3.1.2+dfsg-1.1
radare2 - 3.1.2+dfsg-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2+dfsg-1.1').
